Verses: 2 thidanillaadhavanukku Nee Eppadi Oththaasaipanninaai? Belanatra Kaiyai Nee Eppadi Aadhariththaai?
3 nee Gnaanamillaadhavanukku Eppadi Usaavudhunaiyaayirundhu, Meypporulaik Kuraivara Ariviththaai?
4 yaarukku Arivaip Podhiththaai? Unnidaththilirundhu Purappatta Aavi Yaarudaiyadhu?
5 jalaththin Keezh Madindhavargalukkum, Avargalode Thangugiravargalukkum Thaththalippu Undu.
6 avarukku Munbaagap Paadhaalam Veliyaaith Thirandhirukkiradhu; Naragam Moodappadaadhirukkiradhu.
7 avar Uththaramandalaththai Vettaveliyile Viriththu, Boomiyai Andharaththile Thongavaikkiraar.
8 avar Thanneergalaith Thammudaiya Kaarmegangalil Kattivaikkiraar; Adhin Paaraththinaal Megam Kizhigiradhillai.
9 avar Thamadhu Singaasanam Nirkum Aagaasaththai Sthirappaduththi, Adhinmel Thamadhu Megaththai Virikkiraar.
10 avar Thanneergalmel Sakkaravattam Theerththaar; Velichchamum Irulum Mudiyumattum Appadiye Irukkum.
11 avarudaiya Kandidhaththaal Vaanaththin Thoongal Adhirndhu Thaththalikkum.
12 avar Thamadhu Vallamaiyinaal Samuththirak Kondhalippai Amarappanni, Thamadhu Gnaanaththinaal Adhin Moorkkaththai Adakkugiraar.
13 thamadhu Aaviyinaal Vaanaththai Alangariththaar; Avarudaiya Karam Nelivaana Sarppa Natchaththiraththai Uruvaakkitru.
14 idho, Ivaigal Avarudaiya Kiriyaiyil Kadaikodiyaanavaigal, Avaraikkuriththu Naangal Kettadhu Evvalavu Konjam; Avarudaiya Vallamaiyin Idimuzhakkaththai Arindhavan Yaar Endraan.
